title: Draft Grades Are Meaningless But Also A+ Fun
description: Hot Takedown reviews NFL draft grades and discusses the NBA play-in tournament. Plus a Rabbit Hole about the past (and future) of tanking.
itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, 538, Neil Paine, Geoff Foster, Sara Ziegler
itunes:subtitle: Hot Takedown reviews NFL draft grades and discusses the NBA play-in tournament.
